Material used.Description: HEK293 cells stably expressing ATP7A variants were used.

Readout description.Result Description: Cells with the p.R340W variant showed 90% reduced copper transport activity compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each biological replicate was tested in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type ATP7A-expressing cells were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Two-tailed Student's t-test with p < 0.05 as significant.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Copper transport activity â‰¥ 80% of wild-type.
